== Gandi.net Discount for Ubuntu Members ==

Ubuntu members are entitled to a Gandi.net discount

=== Process ===

1. Create an Gandi handle at <nowiki>[[non-profit@gandi.net]]</nowiki>. If you have an existing account you can skip this step.
2. Send a mail to non-profit (at) gandi.net (Must send from @ubuntu.com e-mail address) asking for a Gandi.net discount. This email MUST contain:
*** Your Gandi handle 
*** Your local currency.
3. You will then be granted our E rates for domains https://www.gandi.net/domain/price/info?grid=E and 50% off cloud hosting.

=== Notes ===

Thanks to Gandi.net for providing this excellent perk to Ubuntu Members and their ongoing support of Free and Open Source Software.
